MajorUpgrade.DowngradeErrorMessage: A later version of [ProductName] is already installed. Setup will now exit.

Feature.Title: Windows Registry
Feature.Description: Adds 'JavaHome' and 'RuntimeLib' Windows Registry keys under 'HKLM\Software\JavaSoft'.

Feature.Title: PATH Variable
Feature.Description: Appends '<jdk>/bin' to the 'PATH' system environment variable.

Feature.Title: JAR Files Association
Feature.Description: Allows to run JAR files from Windows Explorer.
